charges.charge_description: Escape from custody; PENALTY: Not more than 5 yrs and/or $250,000; $100 CVF; Not more than 3 yrs SRT.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Sentence: 15 mos to serve, consecutive to any undischarged term; 3 yrs tsr, concurrent to any other criminal case, usual terms apply; $100 cvf; fine waived; not commit another crime; not possess firearm; dna sample; drug/alco treatment in/out patient and in bop; 75 hours of community service within 1 yr tsr; right to appeal. SUPERVISED RELEASE HRG held 10/19/2010 - [Time Served] - The Court modifies the deft's term of supervision to include a 6 month in-patient treatment program in Mid-Valley, however, the deft will be terminated earlier if he completes a 3-month stay at the in-patient program; the deft is advised of his right to appeal (notified of 14 day deadline). SUPERVISED RELEASE HRG held on 10/21/2011 - The Court finds that the deft violated conditions 1 and 2 as listed in the Probation Form 12 for this case and in 06-CR-833; the deft's TSR is revoked and he is sentenced to 90 days imprs concurrent to 90 days imprs in Case No. L-06-CR-833; upon release the deft will be placed in an inpatient drug treatment for not more than 120 days [community confinement]; the deft is returned to conditions of supervision until expiration date of June 24, 2013; the deft is advised of his right to appeal (notified of 14 day deadline)

charges.charge_description: 18:751A.F---Prisoner in custody of institution or officer
